CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
This test checks that text editor's revealLine centers line where needed.

======= Revealing line: 0
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: 500
      is line centered: true


======= Revealing line: 510
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: 490
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: 1000
      is line centered: true


======= Revealing line: 100
      is line centered: true


======= Revealing line: 9998
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: -100
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: 10000
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: -1
      is line centered: false


======= Revealing line: 10100
      is line centered: false
